Congratulations to your brother!! I think its an awesome accomplishment!! Try to ignore the rude and ignorant remarks people have made. What's even sadder is how uneducated people still are regarding learning disabilities.

Did anyone else notice the interesting fact that in each and everyone of these posts: a.) they are all - without exception - anti-west, anti-France, anti-Israel, etc.; b.) not one of them mentions Russia, its pogroms against Jews, the Russian genocide of the Ukrainians called the Holodomor, the Russian destruction of Chechnya & the Russians continued support for Assad?. What a coincidence it also happens to be a Russian propaganda web-site. The Russians themselves have a term for fools like these - Useful Idiots.

The Blacks who are engaging in criminal activities are the true culprits! Society needs to convince these people that crime does not pay, it hurts everyone concerned! It leaves ripples of physical and emotional pain in its wake. So if they truly believe Black lives matter, then they need to stop the Black-on-Black crime. Stop killing, injuring, robbing, raping, drugging each other!
